thread.title: Steve Martin’s The Underpants

title: Steve Martin’s The Underpants
text:
Steve Martin’s The Underpants THE UNDERPANTS - SUNDAY 
Story Published: Oct 21, 2015 at 10:49 AM EDT Story Updated: Oct 21, 2015 at 10:49 AM EDT A guffaw inducing comedy from the wild and crazy mind of the incomparable Steve Martin. Dusseldorf, 1910. A very public wardrobe malfunction (a young woman’s underpants fall down at a parade—for the King!) becomes the talk of the town in this ribald update of an uproarious German farce. (Yes, there is such a thing.) Chock-full of sexual innuendo, verbal jousting, and non-stop laughter, The Underpants skewers the absurdity of instant fame. Das ist funny! Bill Fennelly ( Hairspray , A Midsummer Night’s Dream ) directs.
